RootPage.headline: To get started, edit the page.tsx file.
RootPage.intro: Looking for a starting point or more instructions? Head over to

SignInPage.title: Login to your account
SignInPage.description: Enter your email below to login to your account
SignInPage.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

SignUpPage.title: Create your account
SignUpPage.description: Fill in the form below to create your account
SignUpPage.emailDescription: We'll use this to contact you. We will not share your email with anyone else.
SignUpPage.passwordDescription: Must be at least 8 characters long.
SignUpPage.emailSentDescription: We've sent a confirmation link to {email}. Check your inbox and follow the instructions to activate your account.

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Reset your password
ForgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link.
ForgotPasswordPage.emailDescription: We will send a password reset link to this email.
ForgotPasswordPage.emailSentDescription: We've sent a password reset link to {email}. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.

ResetPasswordPage.title: Set a new password
ResetPasswordPage.description: Choose a strong password to secure your account.

Api.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
